channel.title: HST on Yoga Instructor on Neil Robinson
channel.description: Recent content in HST on Yoga Instructor on Neil Robinson

item.title: Income Tax for Yoga Instructors
item.description: Introduction To become a yoga instructor, you most certainly spent a lot of your time, energy and not to mention your hard-earned “cash” for yoga instructor training. You completed the training, and you earned respect and experience to become a professional yoga instructor. As a result, you are now making money as a yoga instructor at one or multiple yoga studios. So the question is, how does a yoga instructor report their earnings on their personal tax return?
